{"id":488727084,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620130144,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"88 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488727084/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int rlen = grid.size(), clen = grid[0].size();\n        int perimeter = 0;\n        vector<pair<int, int>> dirs = {{0, 1}, {0, -1}, {1, 0}, {-1, 0}};\n        for (int row = 0; row < rlen; row++) {\n            for (int col = 0; col < clen; col++) {\n                if (grid[row][col] == 0) continue;\n                for (auto x: dirs) {\n                    int r = row + x.first, c = col + x.second;\n                    if (r < 0 || r >= rlen || c < 0 || c >= clen || grid[r][c] == 0)\n                        perimeter++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return perimeter;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
